00022 void AssemblyMediator2D::MoveXY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00023 {
00024         float new_x = old_x - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00025         float new_y = old_y - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)/window_w*2.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y);
00026 
00027         doSnapMove(new_x);
00028         doSnapMove(new_y);
00029 
00030         if (new_y <= (m_Assembly->getOverGround()*1.1))
00031         {
00032                 new_y = m_Assembly->getOverGround();
00033         }
00034 
00035         m_Assembly->setX(new_x);
00036         m_Assembly->setY(new_y);
00037 }
00038 
00044 void AssemblyMediator2D::MoveXZ(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00045 {
00046         float new_x = old_x - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00047         float new_z = old_z - (gl_xmax-gl_xmin)/window_w*(m_mouse_y - event.getMouseEvent().GetY());
00048 
00049         doSnapMove(new_x);
00050         doSnapMove(new_z);
00051 
00052         m_Assembly->setX(new_x);
00053         m_Assembly->setZ(new_z);
00054 }

00061 void AssemblyMediator2D::RotateXY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00062 {
00063         float new_phi   = phi_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/window_h;
00064         float new_theta = theta_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetX() - m_mouse_x)/window_w;
00065 
00066         doSnapRotate(new_phi);
00067         doSnapRotate(new_theta);
00068 
00069         m_Assembly->setPhi(new_phi);
00070         m_Assembly->setTheta(new_theta);
00071 }
00072 
00078 void AssemblyMediator2D::RotateY(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00079 {
00080         float new_theta = theta_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetX() - m_mouse_x)/window_w;
00081         doSnapRotate(new_theta);
00082         m_Assembly->setTheta(new_theta);
00083 }
00084 
00090 void AssemblyMediator2D::RotateXZ(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00091 {
00092         float new_phi = phi_old + 720.0f*(event.getMouseEvent().GetY() - m_mouse_y)/window_h;
00093         float new_rho = rho_old + 720.0f*(m_mouse_x - event.getMouseEvent().GetX())/window_w;
00094 
00095         doSnapRotate(new_phi);
00096         doSnapRotate(new_rho);
00097 
00098         m_Assembly->setPhi(new_phi);
00099         m_Assembly->setRho(new_rho);
00100 }
